summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.7°C) and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5551 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 11091 lux), cloud levels (up 1815 m), outside temperature (up 1.5°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 232.6m lower than yesterday, 726.8m lower than the past week, 1815.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 834.4m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, very clammy and humid and near calm conditions. Light to moderate rain is forecast, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and a mix of sun and clouds. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
